content: this is a free pattern available on my blog tired of killing your plants if you re like me and have a hard time keeping plants alive then these crocheted versions are perfect for you this saguaro cactus is so unique and so fun to make create fun color combinations to make one of a kind pots for this cactus pattern includes step by step photos to help you along as you create your own cactus pattern difficulty beginner pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed worsted weight acrylic yarn size f/3 75mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes black embroidery floss and embroidery needle polyester fiberfill stitch maker yarn needle scissors cardboard skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease crocheting in back loops only crocheting in front loops only how to change colors finished measurements 6 inches tall by 5 5 inches wide
